column4: i'vd installed amarok and kdevelop under a gnome envirment but now i have a /home/-/.kde/share/config empty folder how can i remadiate?
if you no longer have the programs installed you can just delet the .kde folders.
i have the progs installed and i want to run them but i get somme not writble files error in .kde/config(folder that is empty) on another pc this folder has a bunch of filles
perhaps reinstall the programs?  Basically files in your ~ with . are hidden files ususually per user settings of the program.
